genresAdvancedInfo.name: himachali pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Himachali pop is a contemporary music genre that originated in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. It combines traditional folk instruments and melodies with modern arrangements and beats, resulting in a unique fusion of old and new. Himachali pop is characterized by its catchy hooks, upbeat rhythms, and lyrics that often celebrate the natural beauty and cultural heritage of the region.
